basics.name: Ting Xu
basics.label: Polymath in Progress
basics.summary: Undefined by a single discipline, I am a polymath in progress with a passion for technology, music, and research.

work.name: Byte Carnival LLC
work.summary: Developed innovative solutions for AI tool integration and enhanced technical workflows for global clients.
highlights: Designed and deployed dashboards for enhanced observability and monitoring of cloud services, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

Conducted in-depth research and analysis of client-provided evidence(STEM-Related) in collaboration with a law ﬁrm, utilizing analytical frameworks to evaluate alignment with regulatory standards and strategic objectives.

work.name: Varsity Tutors Inc.
work.summary: Tutored college students and professionals in STEM topics and developed tailored learning plans.
highlights: Delivered customized lessons in Mathematics, Physics, and Computer Science.
Designed personalized strategies to improve academic performance.

work.name: Washington University in St. Louis
work.summary: Streamlined campus-wide technology support and developed automated tools for project management.
highlights: Streamlined routing for the tech support group by analyzing daily operations, signiﬁcantly reducing travel distances and boosting campus-wide efﬁciency
Automated the pricing inquiry process for an EdTech project by developing a Python script with Selenium to systematically gather pricing data from vendor websites.

volunteer.summary: Facilitated cultural exchanges and internships for international students.
highlights: Facilitated the onboarding of overseas interns and organized cultural exchange events, improving participant satisfaction.
Matched candidates with international roles, coordinating communication across multiple stakeholders.

awards.title: Scholarship for Foreign Students in Natural and Engineering Sciences
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional academic performance in engineering sciences.

publications.name: Design, Optimization, and Experimental Study of a Novel Direct-Driven Linear-Rotary Wave Generator
publications.summary: This paper introduces a novel linear-rotary wave generator to enhance the reliability and efficiency of wave energy conversion systems. It proposes an optimization approach and validates it through experimental platforms.

publications.name: 3-D Analysis and Experimental Verification of A Novel Magnetic Lead Screw with Checkerboard Array Magnetic Pole
publications.summary: This research proposes a checkerboard array pole magnetic lead screw that improves efficiency and reduces material costs while ensuring optimal thrust and torque characteristics.

publications.name: A 2-D Mesh-based Magnetic Equivalent Circuit Model for Hybrid Exciting Magnetic Lead Screw
publications.publisher: IEEE Transactions on Industry Applications Society
publications.summary: To reduce the computational time involved in analyzing the dynamic performance and conducting optimal design of a hybrid excitation magnetic lead screw (HEMLS), a two-dimensional (2-D) mesh-based (MB) magnetic equivalent circuit (MEC) model is proposed.

projects.name: Cochlear Implant Simulator
highlights: Implemented a Python-based tool using Librosa.
Evaluated noise reduction algorithms for auditory enhancement.

projects.name: Ezzy Job
highlights: Built a backend scraper to automate the collection of job postings from Indeed by location and position.
Developed interactive dashboards using d3.js to track job postings, providing real-time insights with enhanced UI/UX.

projects.name: A Metronome Using TENS Unit
highlights: Created an embedded system to stimulate muscle rhythm for better timing.
Pioneered a novel approach in music performance technology.

projects.name: Quiet Cool: ML for Fan Control
highlights: Designed a custom ML model to balance fan noise and GPU temperature.
Improved cooling efficiency in enterprise server environments.
